verses.roman:
svarūpa kahe,-prabhu, mora kṣama' aparādha
tomā chāḍi' anyatra genu, karinu pramāda

synonyms: svarūpa kahe—Svarūpa Dāmodara said; prabhu—my Lord; mora—my; kṣama'—please excuse; aparādha—offense; tomā—You; chāḍi'—giving up; anyatra—elsewhere; genu—I went; karinu—I have done; pramāda—great mistake.
translation: Svarūpa said, "My dear Lord, please excuse my offense. I gave up Your company to go elsewhere, and that was my great mistake.
